name: Stick Together (Lawlalotti, LimeSync)
description:
Oh boy! BlobFest is finally coming around again! It's time to show up in style! But what to wear? See if you can survey the area and find an outfit that sticks! Huh? Triangle Corp? Oh yeah, I guess there are a lot of them around this year. . . I wonder what that's all about.

Well, we can worry about the small things later! As for right now, let's join our friends in the BlobFest fun!

Hello! It is I, the game dev! This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit game jam! The theme this year was "Joined Together". My sister and I had a lot of fun making this, so we hope you enjoy!
